title: Bonus Episode: Identifying Jack the Ripper
itunes:title: Bonus Episode: Identifying Jack the Ripper
itunes:subtitle: In this special edition, produced by our friends from the Science Focus podcast, criminologist David Wilson applies the latest scientific techniques in the case of the notorious Whitechapel murderer of 1888.
description:
In this special edition, produced by our friends from the Science Focus podcast, criminologist David Wilson applies the latest scientific techniques in the case of the notorious Whitechapel murderer of 1888.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
